name: Ditton Wine Traders
overview:
Fast growing Fine Wine Merchants, specializing in the finest wines from Bordeaux, Burgundy and Italy.

Ditton Wine Traders are one of the most competitively priced fine wine merchants in the UK. It’s a lean company that can work on low margins and still be very profitable. We sell both to the trade and to private collectors and investors.

Many customers come to us because of our expertise in wine investment. Why go to wine funds or fine wine brokers, when you can get to purchase from the guys that they buy from?

We run a blog on the fine wine investment market. Because we are fine wine traders, we are very close to the market and as such very well positioned to advise on what and when to buy. This blog consistently ranks #1 on Google for the keyword “fine wine blog” and is highly regarded in the industry for its informed view on wine investment.
